page.title: 20 Transport - A weeks journey
page.content: The children in the third year kept a log of all the journeys they undertook in a week. {Journey to school:}Foot-54% Car-46% {Distance to school}<1/2 mile-42%, <1 mile-78%, <2 miles-92%. Besides going to school and visiting friends over nearly 2/3rds of journeys were by vehicle. {Purpose of journey Mode of travel} Shopping 30% Car 52% Outing 26% Foot 25% Visit relative 22% Public tran. 15% Sport/Leisure 18% Bike 12% About a third of children travelled on a journey of more than 15 miles. One child visited London and another Newcastle. Our survey suggested that the average distance travelled in a week by third year children was{73 miles.} {THIRD YEAR BLEAK HILL C.P. ST.HELENS
